title: Incorrect "Build" Popup Action Enablement
description: In the Java perspective, the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. This behavior appears to be incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. I believe this is incorrect.
EB: The 'Build' action should be disabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective when the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.
5. Observe that the 'Build' action is still enabled, which is incorrect.
